message: Hello Bob, I am offering this product to you for $20,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I'm not sure I can go as high as $20,000. I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000.
Thanks for your offer, Bob.  I understand your perspective, but the value of this product to me is quite high. Could you consider $17,000?
I understand that the product has value to you, but I still think $17,000 is a bit steep. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so how about $14,000?
